description: Erection of single storey extension at ground floor level with alterations to outrigger; installation of dormer to rear roof slope and roof light to front roof slope; and alterations to the fenestration.
decision_conditions: <p>Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: In the interest of sustainable urban drainage.&nbsp;</p>
<p>The front roof light hereby approved shall be flush with the roof slope, conservation style only.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To preserve the appearance of the conservation area.</p>

<p>Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of one Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The brick/box shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: In the interests of biodiversity.</p>

The windows in the southern elevation at first floor level shall be fixed shut and obscure glazed.


REASON: To protect the amenity of neighbouring residents.

All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance including type, size, colour, bond, pointing, coursing, jointing, profile and texture.


REASON: To ensure the development preserves the appearance of the conservation area

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
